summary: Experienced technician in various diverse fields including driver safety, building maintenance and IT with a demonstrated history of working in the government and with international diplomatic clients. Skilled in Problem Solving, Training, Sales, Customer Service, and Team Work. Strong operations professional with a BSc. in Engineering Science from University of Exeter.
